name: sbcani
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3
body: |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w2, w3))

stmt.origin: bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w2, w3), wa(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w2, w3))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), wa(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wb(wa(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wa(w2, w3))

|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w2, w3))

-| wb(wa(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wa(w2, w3))

stmt.origin: anbi12i(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w2, w3)

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wa(w2, w3))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w2)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), wa(w2, w3))

comment: Distribution of class substitution over conjunction, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 27-May-2019.)
